text: The Big Man () is a 1908 Russian silent drama movie. It was directed by Alexander Drankov.Большой человек (1908)БОЛЬШОЙ ЧЕЛОВЕК The movie is a screen version of the play "The Big Man" performed by artists of the St. Petersburg People's House. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1908 movies
title: The Big Man
